mapper.sql: warehouse_id, name, store_name, status, working_days, min_working_days, postings_limit, min_postings_limit, is_rfbs, has_entrusted_acceptance, can_print_act_in_advance, has_postings_limit, is_karantin, is_kgt, is_timetable_editable, first_mile_type_json, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ozon_warehouse ORDER BY warehouse_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ozon_warehouse ( warehouse_id, name, store_name, status, working_days, min_working_days, postings_limit, min_postings_limit, is_rfbs, has_entrusted_acceptance, can_print_act_in_advance, has_postings_limit, is_karantin, is_kgt, is_timetable_editable, first_mile_type_json, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{warehouseId}, #{name}, #{storeName}, #{status}, #{workingDays}, #{minWorkingDays}, #{postingsLimit}, #{minPostingsLimit}, #{isRfbs}, #{hasEntrustedAcceptance}, #{canPrintActInAdvance}, #{hasPostingsLimit}, #{isKarantin}, #{isKgt}, #{isTimetableEditable}, #{firstMileTypeJson}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ozon_warehouse SET name = #{name}, store_name = #{storeName}, status = #{status}, working_days = #{workingDays}, min_working_days = #{minWorkingDays}, postings_limit = #{postingsLimit}, min_postings_limit = #{minPostingsLimit}, is_rfbs = #{isRfbs}, has_entrusted_acceptance = #{hasEntrustedAcceptance}, can_print_act_in_advance = #{canPrintActInAdvance}, has_postings_limit = #{hasPostingsLimit}, is_karantin = #{isKarantin}, is_kgt = #{isKgt}, is_timetable_editable = #{isTimetableEditable}, first_mile_type_json = #{firstMileTypeJson}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}
